    • Method Detail

      • dependencies

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Plugin>> dependencies()
        Description copied from class: Plugin
        Specifies the plugin dependencies that this plugin has, if any. Every dependency is specified as a class in the returned list. The Scalar platform will ensure that one instance of every listed dependency has been instantiated before this plugin is instantiated. If one or more dependencies are missing, a MissingDependencyException will be thrown at instantiation time of this plugin. Note that the order in which the dependencies are specified, is not important. By default, a plugin has no dependencies (i.e., the empty list is returned).
        Overrides:
        dependencies in class Plugin
        Returns:
        A list containing plugin types that denote the other plugins that this plugin depends on.
